name: Theseus: First Flight
blurb: 2D side-scroller set in a sci-fi universe, for Android and PC

rewards.reward: Personal Thank you! -\r\nFor your contribution to the project you will receive a personal message of gratitude for your help in our project.
Thank you in credits + Personal thank you - \r\nIn addition to a personal thank you message for helping our project, you will also receive your name in the credits of the game.

Game for PC or Android + Thank you in credits + Personal thank you -\r\nWant a free copy of our game when it is released? For your contribution at this level we\u2019ll give it to you, as well as a mention in the credits (and a personal thank you message to boot). (Must choose Android or PC release)

Digital Soundtrack + Game for PC or Android + Thank you in credits + Personal thank you -\r\nWe had a great time listening to our game while we were testing it. At this level a backer will get a Digital OST, a copy of the game, your name in the credits, and a personal thank you message. (Must choose Android or PC release)

Digital Art Book  + Game  for PC or Android + Thank you in credits + Personal thank you -\r\nIs sound not your style? Maybe a digital art book, showing the initial concepts for the game, is more your style? Backers at this level will get that Digital Art Book, a copy of the game, their names in the credits, and a personal message of thanks. (Must choose Android or PC release)

Beta during Overhaul + Game for PC or Android + Thank you in credits + Personal thank you -\r\nAre you a beta loving gamer? We\u2019ll give backers of this reward  level beta access to the revamp process. Also, a copy of the game, mention in the credits, and a personal message. (Must choose Android or PC release)

Art and Sound  +Beta during Overhaul + Thank you in credits + Personal thank you -\r\nDid you have trouble deciding between getting a digital OST or Digital Art Book? Did you want both? Backers at this level will receive BOTH. As an added bonus we\u2019ll also let you in on the beta during the overhaul of the game. You\u2019ll also get thanked in the credits and in a personal message.

Game copy for PC and Android (or two of a platform) + Beta during Overhaul + Thank you in credits + Personal thank you -\r\nFeeling like being the gifting type? Or perhaps you have a PC and an Android device and would like the game for both? We\u2019ll give you 2 copies of the game (Must choose Android or PC for each) for backers of this reward. We\u2019ll also give you beta access and a personal thank you as well.

Beta during overhaul + Game copy for PC and Android (or two of a platform) + Digital art book + Thank you in credits + Personal thank you -\r\n Want beta access but just the art book? Backers of this reward will get 2 copies of the game (Must choose Android or PC release for each one), access to our beta, your name in the credits, and a personal thank you. Oh, and the digital art book. Can\u2019t forget that.

Beta during overhaul + Game copy for PC and Android (or two of a platform) + Soundtrack +Thank you in credits + Personal thank you -\r\n Up for a digital soundtrack while testing out the beta of the game? We\u2019ll hand backers at this reward level 2 copies of the game (Must choose Android or PC release for each), access to the beta, the digital OST, a mention in the credits, and a personal thank you message.

Game copy for PC and Android (or two of a platform) + Kickstarter Skin + Beta during Overhaul + Thank you in credits + personal thank -you People like customization! Just look at Hat Simulator 2000 by Faucet Software (or whatever it\u2019s named). For backers at this reward level they will have access to a custom ship skin in the game, exclusive to KickStarter. You\u2019ll also get 2 copies of the game (Must choose Android or PC release for each), beta access, a mention in the credits, and personal message of thanks.

Create your own enemy type +  Game copy for PC and Android (or two of a platform) + Soundtrack + Digital Art book + Mention in the Credits + Personal thank you - Backers at this level are more than just helping out our project. They are putting their faith in the end result. Putting the same faith towards them by allowing them into the design process during the next game we develop. We\u2019ll also throw in the digital OST, digital art book, mention in the credits, and a personal message of thanks.

Input on next project +  Game copy for PC and Android (or two of a platform)  + Mention in the credits + Personal Thank you - \r\nOur highest esteem comes at the highest rewards level. Backers at this level have put their trust in not just our project but also in us. As such we want to pick their brain and have them help us out on the design of one of our next projects. In addition, they will also receive 2 copies of the game (Must choose Android or PC release for each), mention in the credits, and a personal message of thanks.

Input on Game Revamp + Game copy for PC and Android (or two of a platform) + Special mention in the credits -\r\nIf you thought, looking at our game play video for the original game, and thought "Hey, I could have done better than that!" you will have chance. For this reward a backer will be directly involved with the production of the game's revamp. You'll get two copies of the game you helped finished, and you'll receive special mention in the credits letting everyone know about your contribution to the final product.
